definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 40:13 judgment;—abs. [[מִשְׁפָּט]] Ex 21:31 + 203 t., + [[לְשְִׁ֠פָּט]] Ez Eze 44:24 (but read Kt [[לִשְׁפּׂט]] with LXX Targum SyrVer Co al.); cstr. [[מִשְׁפַּט]] Ex 23:6 + 50 t.; sf. [[מִשְׁפָּטִי]] Is 40:27 +; [[מִשְׁפָּטָם]] Je 49:12 +; [[מִשְׁפָּטָן]] Nu 27:5; pl. [[מִשְׁפָּטִים]] Je 4:12 + 34 t.; sf. [[מִשְׁפָּטֶיךָ]] De 33:10 +, etc.;—
judgment:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: place, court seat of judgment De 25:1, 1Ki 7:7, Is 28:6, Ec 3:16. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: process, procedure, litigation before judges: ´[[הֵבִיא במ]]: Job 14:3, Ec 11:9, Ec 12:14; ´[[בא במ]]:, c. [[עם]] Is 3:14, Job 22:4, c. [[את]] Ps 143:2, c. [[יחדו]] Job 9:32, ´[[חלד במ]]: Job 34:23, cf. Ez Eze 34:16, Ps 112:5; pl. [[דבּר משׁפטים]], c. [[את]] litigate with Je 1:16, Je 4:12, Je 12:1, Je 39:5 = Je 52:9, sg. [[מִשְׁפָּט]] in ‖ 2Ki 25:6, by error. †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: case or cause presented for judgment: ´[[בעל מ]]: Is 50:8; ´[[ערךְ מ]]: Job 13:18, Job 23:4; ´[[שׁמע מ]]: 1Ki 3:11; ´[[שׁפט מ]]: La 3:59, cf. Nu 27:5 (P) 2Sa 15:4. †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: sentence, decision of judgment: [[כן משׁפטךָ]] 1Ki 20:40 thus is thy sentence; ´[[עת ומ]]: Ec 8:5, Ec 8:6 time and sentence; ´[[על מ]]: De 17:11 according to the sentence; [[מָוֶת]] ´[[מ]]: De 19:6, De 21:22, Je 26:11, Je 26:16; [[דמים]] ´[[מ]]: Ez Eze 7:23, cf. Hb Hab 1:4, Hab 1:4, Ps 7:7, Ps 17:2, Ez Eze 23:45; pl. only Ez 16:68 [[משׁפטֵי נאפות]]; Ho 6:5 rd. sg. [[מִשְׁפָּטִי בָאוֹד]] for [[מִשְׁפָּטֶיךָ אוֹר]] after LXX SyrVer Targum Ew Hi Che and most mod. †

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: time of judgment, ´[[לִא יקומו במ]]: Ps 1:5 (late; prob. judgment of the resurrection).
attribute of the [[שׁׂפֵט]], justice, right, rectitude:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God, ´[[אלהי מ]]: Is 30:18; ´[[הֲשׁׂפֵט כָּל־הָאָרֶץ לאׁ יַעֲשֶׂה מ]]: Ge 18:25 (J), cf. Job 40:8, De 32:4, Ps 111:7; he loves it Ps 33:5, Ps 37:28, Ps 99:4; ´[[חדק ומ]]: Ho 2:21, Ps 89:15 = Ps 97:2; will not pervert it Job 8:3, Job 34:12, cf. Job 37:23; [[כמשׁפטךָ]] Ps 119:149 (‖[[חסדךָ]]); [[מִשְׁפָּֽטְךָ תְּהוֹם רָבָּה]] Ps 36:7 (read sg.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of man: ´[[אַשְׁרֵי שׁׂמְרֵי מ]]: Ps 106:8 (‖[[חדקה ]]); the tongue of the wise speaketh ´[[מ]]: Ps 37:30; so of thoughts ´[[מ]]: Pr 12:5; put on ´[[מ]]: as robe Job 29:14, chosen Job 34:4; ´[[עשׂה מ]]:: God requires that man should do it Mic 6:8, Is 1:17, Is 56:1, cf. Is 61:8; it is the joy of the righteous Pr 21:15; rulers should know it Mic 3:1, cf. Pr 29:4; wicked ruler ´[[שׂוֹנֵא מ]]: Job 34:17; abhors it Mic 3:9, cf. Pr 19:28, Pr 21:7, Pr 28:5.

decision of the [[שׁׂפֵט]] in a case of law (v. Br:Hex 252 sq.): sg. of particular decision of a case Ex 21:31 (E); pl. of series of decisions Ex 21:1, Ex 24:3 (JE) De 7:12 (D:2); in covt. code and D, collection of pentads in conditional or temp. cf., c. [[כּי]] or [[אם]] in D, and subj. in combination, [[חקים ומשׁפטים]] De 4:1, De 4:5, De 4:8, De 4:14, De 4:45 +; in code of H and after, in combin. [[חקות ומשׁפטים]], Le 18:4, Le 18:5, Le 18:26, Le 19:37 +; (the specific type of these laws in H is [[אִישׁ כִּי]], over against [[נפשׁ כי]] or [[אדם כי]] in code of P, v. Br:Hex 254 f.); other combin., redactional and later, Le 26:46, Nu 36:13, De 30:16, 2Ki 17:37, 2Ch 33:8, Ne 9:13, Ps 18:23, Ps 89:31, Ps 147:19.

definitions.title: 6. a.
definitions.body: proper, fitting, measure 1Ki 5:8; fitness Is 28:26, Is 40:14 (of fitness in the order of nature; cf. Di).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: custom, manner: [[הכהנים]] ´[[מ]]: 1Sa 2:13 custom of the priests (rightful due, acc. to Th We Dr and most); [[מִשְׁפָּטוֹ]] 1Sa 27:11 his (David’s) custom; ´[[מ]]: [[הגוים]] 2Ki 17:33 manner of the nations, cf. 2Ki 17:26, 2Ki 17:27 (Rs:sem. 1, 24, 2nd ed. 23); ´[[כמ]]: after the manner, custom, fashion (of) Ge 40:13, Ex 21:9 (E) Ju Jdg 18:7, 1Ki 18:28, 2Ki 11:14, 2Ki 17:34, 1Ch 6:17, Ez Eze 42:11, Ps 119:132. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[מה משׁפט]] Ju Jdg 13:12 what manner of a boy, cf. 2Ki 1:7. †

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: plan . . . of the tabernacle Ex 26:30 (P); temple 1Ki 6:38; palace Je 30:18.
